ygData.subject: Tume of magi knowledge V1.0 **SPOILERS**
ygData.msgSnippet: It is my belief that magi(all casting classes) should be the knowledge base for the lore(history/myths) of the EQ world. So below is my growing list of
ygData.messageBody:
It is my belief that magi(all casting classes) should be the knowledge base
for the lore(history/myths) of the EQ world. So below is my growing list of
summerized Q & A's from this list. Please feel free to use it to impress you
friends. Remember we are wizards keeper of knowledge destroyers of worlds.

Items Info/Location
---------------------- -------------------------------------------
Black Flowing Robe Najena
Blue Robe Erudin, Qeynos
Brown/orange Robe Thaumaturgist Robe (befallen)
Dingy White Robe Damask (befallen)
Green Robe Felwithe
Red Robe Erudin
Violet Robe Freeport
White Robe Gossimer (befallen)
Yellow Robe Ak'anon (Though I think only gnomes can ware
them)

Staff Skull Gnoll Embalmbers (Necromancer Gnolls)
Lake Rathe zone
Senior Apprentice Robe +1 mana only no extra regeneration/+? AC
Glowing Wooden Crook +5HP/+5M Magic wpn 19 Dmg.

Spells
----------------------
Pillar of Fire Located at Erudin Library or Research it.
Root Max out Alteration and use on White con'd or
below.

Quests
----------------------
Chanda Miller Bear Hide Armor. Killing Paw Gnolls and
Bandits will raise faction with the Karana
Residents. CAN be used by wizards.

MISC
----------------------
Class Specific Skills Evo, Channel, Div, Abj, Etc.
= ((Level + 1) * 5)
Offense = (Level * 4)
Defense = ((Level * 4) + 1)
Weapons Pierce, 2/1h Blunt = ((Level + 1)*3)
